name: infinite-loopers-backend
description: Task management system with achievements - microservices backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apigateway/code && npm install && cd ../.. && cd users/code && npm install && cd ../.. && cd tasks/code && npm install && cd ../.. && cd achievements/code && npm install && cd ../.. && cd shop/code && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.setup:db: cd users/code && npx prisma migrate dev && cd ../.. && cd tasks/code && npx prisma migrate dev && cd ../.. && cd achievements/code && npx prisma migrate dev && cd ../.. && cd shop/code && npx prisma migrate dev && cd ../..
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "GATEWAY,USERS,TASKS,ACHIEVEMENTS,SHOP" --prefix-colors "cyan,blue,green,yellow,magenta" "cd apigateway/code && npm run dev" "cd users/code && npm run dev" "cd tasks/code && npm run dev" "cd achievements/code && npm run dev" "cd shop/code && npm run dev"
scripts.prisma:generate:all: npm run prisma:generate:users && npm run prisma:generate:tasks && npm run prisma:generate:achievements && npm run prisma:generate:shop
